cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 110 miles east of Cape Canaveral, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: expected to turn north, then accelerate north-northeast paralleling the U.S. East Coast, passing close to the South and North Carolina coasts before racing offshore toward the waters south of New England and Atlantic Canada
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina/North Carolina coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch north of Ponte Vedra Beach FL to Savannah River GA and north of Surf City NC to the NC/VA border including Albemarle & Pamlico Sounds; Tropical Storm Watch NC/VA border to Chincoteague VA and Chesapeake Bay south of Smith Point
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Sebastian Inlet FL to Ponte Vedra Beach FL and north of Savannah River to Surf City NC; Tropical Storm Warning north of Ponte Vedra Beach FL to Savannah River and Jupiter Inlet FL to Sebastian Inlet FL; Storm Surge Warning Jupiter Inlet FL to Surf City NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida east coast through Georgia, South Carolina and North Carolina coasts, then offshore of the Mid-Atlantic and New England before reaching Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Only a low (â‰¤5%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds late Friday into Saturday; breezy northeasterly gusts possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected; only minor tidal departures possible.
weather_observation.rainfall: Rainfall generally under 2 inches; heavy rain field stays south and east of the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large swells, dangerous surf and rip currents beginning late week; minor coastal flooding at times of high tide possible.
